sentence.Network_en: A person retains a domicile until it is abandoned.
sentence.Network_cn: 个人保留住所直到其更换。

sentence.Network_en: I thought it better to change my domicile for the present.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin domicilium 'dwelling', from domus 'home'

entry.def: Your domicile is the place where you live.

means.word_mean: 1. (law) the residence where where you have your permanent home or principal establishment and to where, whenever you are absent, you intend to return; every person is compelled to have one and and only one domicile at a time;
2. housing that someone is living in;

sentences.sentence: "he built a modest dwelling near the pond"
"they raise money to provide homes for the homeless"

means.word_mean: 1. make one's home or live in;

sentences.sentence: "These people inhabited all the islands that are now deserted"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的,能……的"; 2. 表名词,"物体"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 易拉长的,易变形的,可塑的
stems_affixes.word_buile: duct引导+ile能……的→能引导的→可塑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 肥沃的,富饶的;能繁殖的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fert=fer带来,拿来+ile……的,能……的→能带来粮食→肥沃的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不孕的;不肥沃的,贫瘠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+fertile肥沃的→adj.不孕的;不肥沃的,贫瘠的
juven年轻+ile……的,能……的→n.青少年,少年读物 adj.青少年的,幼稚的
serv服务+ile……的,能……的→为[主人]服务的
tort扭曲+ile……的,能……的→adj.扭转的,弯曲的
volat飞+ile……的,能……的→adj.反复无常的,挥发性的
juven年轻+ile……的,能……的→n.青少年,少年读物 adj.青少年的,幼稚的
miss送,放出+ile物体→n.导弹,发射物
project投射出+ile物体→向前扔的物体
